name: Fresh Slice Bar - Grape & Brown Sugar (120g)
description:
Think sun ripened, full fragranced vine grapes in this natural soap. 
Our soap is enriched with antioxidant grapes and blended with brown sugar, scented with a heavenly sweet, fruity smells. 
It gently cleanses and leaves skin hydrated and soft.

name: Fresh Slice Bar - Aloe & Broccoli (120g)
description:
Imagine yourself in the midst of a green garden. This handmade slice bar is made with actual aloe and broccoli fragments to enrich your skin with essential vitamins and minerals. 

Awaken your senses with our slice bar soap. A sweet and a happy scent!

name: Natural Slice Bar - Peppermint (120g)
description:
Wake up to the refreshing smell of peppermint in the morning. 
It is a scent which is very cool and soothing.

name: Cocktail Slice Bar - Retinol (120g)
description:
Luxury beauty soap with added olive oils, castor oils and apricot kernel oils, and natural ingredients which are matured together with pure vegetable oils blended in perfect harmony. 
You're going to love the moisture rich, clean rinsing lather, and fragrances that will awaken the senses.

Ground and blended Paprika pieces in with soap chips with a sweet aroma. Plentiful in Vitamin A(Retinol) for optimizing your complexion.

name: 24KT GOLD FLAKE LUXURIOUS SOAP - REAL GOLD!!!

Gold effectively removes odors, stains and toxins from your skin and keeps you fresh longer.

Gold does not affect the natural pH skin level, so you donâ€™t have to worry about dryness or local discomfort. On the contrary, skin improves its aspect, regaining elasticity and freshness, while red blotches and possible sun burns are immediately healed. Our unique blend with glittering gold leaf leaves a subtle, lightly sweet and rich aroma.

It has been told that gold bar soap is what kept the skin of Cleopatra looking young and flawless. Now it's your turn...

MSRP - $29.99!!!!
